events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back.
Assigning the refund case to Agent Sarah to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! Sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'm here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and I have attached the photo of the wrong item that was delivered.
We have verified the issue and will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and help! I appreciate the refund being arranged so smoothly.
The refund case is now closed after confirming the refund has been authorized and processed successfully.
Just checking in to ensure the refund was received correctly and to see if you need any further assistance.
Closing this case now as the refund has been confirmed received and the customer has no further questions.
